name: Tatami Samurai
description: I practice a Samurai martial arts called Shinkendo, in which we do Tameshigiri (Test cutting) with katana's. I decided to bring some of what I have learned to the Leap Motion in a fun and interactive experience. Have fun slicing your way through tatami mats in either stationary or thrown game modes. With further development, I plan to make this game an educational experience as well as a fun one.
